text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
) RNS Announcement: Bitcoin Purchase.

Purchase of additional Bitcoin as part of "The 10 Year Plan" which includes an ongoing treasury policy of acquiring Digital Assets, including Bitcoin.

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (SWC) RNS Announcement: Bitcoin Treasury.

Andrew Webley
@asjwebley
: "As we move forward, we aim to communicate transparently. Investors have asked us to share our current Bitcoin Treasury and today we have announced this.

As we explore further opportunities through organic growth and corporate acquisitions, alongside increasing our Digital Assets Treasury, including Bitcoin, we will keep investors updated."

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (SWC) RNS Announcement: The 10 Year Plan.

Andrew Webley
@asjwebley
: "We have a clear plan to deliver significant value for our shareholders and today document this so that our shareholders can share the exciting journey.

We are focused on accelerating short-term growth by scaling our proven core services, while also exploring strategic acquisitions that could unlock compelling value.

By taking a pioneering approach to treasury management using Digital Assets, including Bitcoin, we believe we offer investors an excellent opportunity."

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company IPO Announcement.

First Day of Dealings, Name Change, Result of WRAP Retail Offer, Placing and Subscription.

Andrew Webley
@asjwebley
: "As we explore further opportunities through organic growth and corporate acquisitions, we are also pioneering the adoption of a Digital Asset Treasury Policy, including Bitcoin, into our strategy. We are confident that this business model will return substantial returns to shareholders."

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…
